hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that King Dodongo dislikes smoke.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.
